description: The Police were an English rock band formed in London in 1977.
name: Police

member.name: Sting
member.description: Sting, is an English musician and actor. He was the frontman, songwriter and bassist for new wave band the Police.

member.name: Andy Summers
member.description: Andy Summers is an English guitarist best known as a member of the rock band the Police.

member.name: Stewart Copeland
member.description: Stewart Copeland is an American musician and composer. He is best known for his work as the drummer of the British rock band the Police from 1977 to 1986.
